import React from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { Nav, Navbar, Container, NavDropdown } from 'react-bootstrap' const Header = () => { const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin) const {userInfo} = userLogin return (
Verona Products Professional
Home About
Cart {userInfo ? ( Profile Logout ) : ( Log in )}
) } export default Header
